translations: 煽动（incite 的 ing 形式）；刺激，激励

sentences.sentence: They were accused of inciting the crowd to violence.
sentences.translation: 他们被控煽动群众暴乱。

sentences.sentence: The next key element of the a well-made play is referred to as the inciting incident.
sentences.translation: 一出好戏的下一个关键元素被称为“煽动性事件”。
